2.text: Cut the tops off the strawberries.

3.text: Mash up the strawberries with a fork or chopsticks.
3.vid: /8/8f/Make a TikTok Japanese Strawberry Milk Step 3 Version 2.360p.mp4

4.text: Stir in about 1 tbsp (17 g) of granulated sugar.
4.vid: /3/3c/Make a TikTok Japanese Strawberry Milk Step 4 Version 2.360p.mp4

5.text: Pour the mixture into a pan and turn it on medium heat.
5.vid: /a/a0/Make a TikTok Japanese Strawberry Milk Step 5 Version 2.360p.mp4

6.text: Turn off the heat when the mixture comes to a simmer.
6.vid: /e/ee/Make a TikTok Japanese Strawberry Milk Step 6 Version 2.360p.mp4

7.text: Mash up the strawberry mixture again.
7.vid: /6/6e/Make a TikTok Japanese Strawberry Milk Step 7 Version 2.360p.mp4

8.text: Let the mixture cool to room temperature.

9.text: Pour the strawberry mixture through a strainer into a bowl.
9.vid: /4/43/Make a TikTok Japanese Strawberry Milk Step 9 Version 2.360p.mp4

10.text: Mix the strawberry mixture into a glass of cold milk.
10.vid: /a/a4/Make a TikTok Japanese Strawberry Milk Step 10 Version 2.360p.mp4
